sentence.text: Patient 2 was diagnosed with CHH at 3 years based on mild short stature (height Z-score −2.5 at age 1.0 year and −3.5 at 3 years), sparse hair, recurrent infections and radiographic findings of mild metaphyseal changes consistent with CHH (Figure 1).
Her adult height is 143.1 cm (−3.8 SDS).
She was diagnosed with asthma at 14 years.
HRCT at 15 years revealed bronchiectasis in the right middle lobe, left lingula and both lower lobes; these showed progression at 20 years.
Immunoglobulin replacement therapy was commenced based on low IgG subclass levels and bronchiectasis.
